meaning list.sentence translation: Yagumye mu gisagara gatoyi kugira ngo agire inama.

meaning list.sentence: The media played up the risks of the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ivyo binyamakuru vyararengeje urugero ingorane zishobora guterwa n’ubuhinga bushasha.

meaning list.sentence: My back has been playing up again.
meaning list.sentence translation: Umugongo wanje waratanguye gusubira kuntera ingorane.

meaning list.sentence: She popped in to say hello on her way to work.
meaning list.sentence translation: Yarahagaze kugira ngo aramutse mu nzira aja ku kazi.

meaning list.meaning: Kugira ngo umuntu atere imbere, abandanye afise umwiyemezo .
meaning list.sentence: Despite the challenges, they pushed ahead with their plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: Naho vyari bigoye, barabandanije gutera imbere n’umugambi wabo.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mu gihe atariko araraba, umuntu aca yiba umufuko wiwe, aca arahunga.

meaning list.sentence: They set off on their trip early in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: Batangura urugendo rwabo kare mu gitondo.

meaning list.sentence: The venue was set up for the wedding reception.
meaning list.sentence translation: Aho hantu hari hateguwe kugira ngo bazokwakire ubugeni.

meaning list.sentence: We had to sit through a very boring lecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: Twabwirizwa kwihanganira insiguro irambiranye cane.

meaning list.sentence: True friends will always stick by you.
meaning list.sentence translation: Abagenzi nyakuri bazokwama ari intahemuka kuri wewe.

meaning list.meaning: Gutangura kumarana umwanya n'ikintu canke umuntu .
meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Amaze kwimukira mu gisagara, yaratanguye kumarana umwanya n’umugwi mushasha w’abagenzi.
